question: How and when do I register?
answer: Following SOLD OUT programs in Toronto, Montreal, Vancouver & Calgary, [event_name] conference will definitely fill up quickly! We suggest you register you or your group as soon as possible to ensure availability. To register for the conference please click on our REGISTER page or call your “Art of...” Representative at 1.866.99.ART.OF (27863) today.

question: When will I get my confirmation/receipt for the conference?
answer: Your confirmation/receipt will be e-mailed to you immediately upon your online registration. Please allow 24 hours for all phone/fax registrations.

question: When and how will I get my tickets?
answer:
Electronic tickets (e-tickets) will be e-mailed to you immediately after your online purchase. The e-mail will include your confirmation number, receipt and tickets in PDF format to download and print.

When you arrive, please provide a printed copy of your e-ticket along with government issued photo identification to gain access to the conference. If you do not recieve an e-ticket please contact us immediately.

question: What if I misplaced my ticket?
answer: In the unfortunate circumstance that your ticket has been misplaced, lost or stolen please contact us at 1.866.99.ART.OF (27863) as soon as possible.

question: Will I be assigned a seat or is it first come, first served seating?
answer: Seating for the conference is assigned on a first come, first seated basis. [vip_seating]

question: Are there discounts for groups?
answer: We offer discounted rates for groups of three (3) or more. Please refer to our PRICING page for complete details.

question: Can you provide groups with reserved seating?
answer: Upon request groups of 20 or more can be allocated a specific seating section. The exact location of your section will be identified on arrival. For further information please contact us at 1.866.99.ART.OF (27863).

question: What is the cancellation policy?
answer: If you are unable to attend, tickets may be transferred to another person or to a future conference. The Art of Productions Inc. reserves the right to cancel a conference prior to the start date or delay the start date due to low enrolment, speaker availability or other uncontrollable circumstances. If for these reasons a conference must be cancelled, The Art of Productions Inc. will refund only the cost of the conference registration. Tickets are non-refundable.
